text:
Hizb ut-Tahrir: The decision of the Council of Ministers in Ramallah to raise the age of marriage is a crime

02 Nov 2019, 10:42

Ramallah - Sawa
Hizb ut-Tahrir said Saturday that the cabinet's decision on the age of marriage in Rafah was a crime and its excuses were just pretexts.
The text of Hizb ut-Tahrir's statement as reported on its website
The PA is accelerating the implementation of the enemies of Islam programs to corrupt women and dismantle the family
By applying the CEDAW Convention and amending the Personal Status Law
The Council of Ministers of the Authority decided in its session on Monday, 21/10/2019, to appoint the President of the Authority to amend Article 5 of the Personal Status Law on the age of marriage to become 18 solar years for both sexes, and this decision awaits the signature of the President of the Authority to become law.
This decision, which the authority and the feminist associations try to decorate as a preservation of the family and alleviation of divorce cases in Palestine, claiming that women do not complete their growth before the age of eighteen, is a crime and its justifications are flimsy pretexts, such as decorating the devil to evil and obscene. Children, and they are the most people seeking to spoil them; power, women's associations and suspicious bodies funded by the West, spare no effort in working to corrupt society festivals dancing, singing, marathons and mixing activities and breaking barriers between the sexes, that is, they raise instincts and fuel lusts T want to delay marriage itself! These associations are not ashamed to raise a slogan for women (my body is royal) and slogan (I do not need your care, control, state, honor), any payment to our sons and daughters to obscene clearer than this ?!
The Authority's decision, and its sponsorship of the corrupt activities carried out by feminist and other institutions, is a response to the enemies of Islam and the implementation of the sinful CEDAW Convention, which the Authority acceded to in 2014, paving the way for the abolition of the Personal Status Law, which still has the rest of the Shariah provisions. This is a propulsion of moral decay and uncontrollability and destruction of the family! It is a sinful crime that the English colonists, the occupied Jews and the Jordanian regime did not dare to hand over this country, so that the submissive authority would come in response to the colonial infidel and the agreements he signed, and commit what no one had ever done before in the blessed land! In her crime, she is moving towards a civil law (decomposing of the Shariah rules) that destroys the family and pushes society towards a beastly western life in the relationship between women and men. Perhaps the statement of the Minister of Women's Affairs in power reveals the blurring of the eyes of the unseen. The move towards setting the age of marriage (18 years) for girls came in line with the signing of several international conventions by the State of Palestine ... Hamad said in a statement to "Jerusalem", "Palestine has recently joined the Convention," CEDAW ", of which the Convention on the Rights of the Child And the age of childhood is (18 years) '' (Jerusalem 30/7/2019).
The CEDAW agreement, which the government is proud to sign, aims at forcing the peoples of the world, especially Muslims, to adopt corrupt Western values and a Western way of life in the relationship between men and women. Marriage, equality between men and women in inheritance, abolition of male guardianship over women, equality in divorce and marriage, abolition of divorce, prohibition of polygamy, allowing a Muslim woman to marry a kaafir, and many other laws that remove Muslims from their religion Qat that arise between men and women.
The Authority did not stop at CEDAW but followed it in 2016 with the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.This plan belongs to a resolution adopted by the General Assembly of the United Nations in 2000 and carried eight goals, and the period extends to 2015, and then extended this plan to 2030, and made it seven Ten goals allow colonial countries to intervene in many areas of peoples, even in their cultural and intellectual structure, which in fact are traps and colonial machinations and circumvent Muslims to deviate from their religion; for example, the fifth objective of this plan emphasizes the strengthening of CEDAW's output on women under the pretext of development!
The colonial West does not want us good, and does not want in the Muslim woman dignified reserved precious, and does not want her if she reaches the age to meet around the children and grandchildren kiss her hands and put them in respect and appreciation, and do not want to lower his wings to his parents and say God have mercy on them as Lord They want to turn our women into cheap goods for display and pleasure. They want a family united by a mosque, they want us to live the diseases and epidemics that have invaded their country as a result of their bestial lifestyles, they want to demolish what remains in our societies the manifestations of chastity and purity envy from themselves.
The people of Palestine: The work to amend the laws and legislations is part of a campaign decided by the colonial infidel targeting the laws, educational curricula and way of life, so that they reach their malicious goals by creating a generation that does not see anything wrong in ceding the blessed land and abandoning its sanctities. Suspicious, and their evils are too great to count, but we will spare no effort in exposing their actions and warn you of them.
Judges, muftis, imams, preachers, notables and influencers: You are aware of the size of the attack on Islam and its rulings, and you feel what the situation of the children of Muslims as a result of corrupt policies have become ... Are you silent and you see the spoilers working to secularize our daughters and youth ?! Do you accept that corruption prevails as you look ?! Do you accept that outrageous are common in those who believe ?! Stand a position that stems from your faith and say the word of truth that pleases your Lord.
Dear parents in the blessed land: The authority that ceded your land, and then handed you over to the Jews, and then ate your money in vain, did not save you land, money or blood, here today you want to undermine your symptoms! What is left for you if you keep silent about its crimes and did not stand in the face of its corrupt and criminal policies ?! We stand for you and your sons and daughters, and you prefer to die without your sanctity. Fire and the fuel of people and stones on them angels angler distress and do not disobey God what he commanded them and do what is ordered.
Finally, Islam is the real guarantee for a decent life, and the legal provisions honored women and guaranteed her rights and safeguarded her offer and preserved her dignity. Islam has made the foundation of the family strengthen God Almighty, the strength of God is governing the relationship between men and wife, which is the basis of the relationship between parents and children, May God establish the family, so that the family will enjoy peace and tranquility, and in the shadow of the caliphate, everyone will enjoy a precious life of dignity and good care. Their faith and honor died and distract them the evils of criminals, and hasten us his victory and his chastity; succession to the Platform for adult prophecy establish religion stands a bulwark against the enemies of Islam and Muslims.
and thank Allah the god of everything
Fourth of Rabi I 1441 Hizb ut-Tahrir
Corresponding to the blessed land of Palestine
